author: Joseph Zucker
title: Karl-Anthony Towns' Mother Jacqueline Dies from Coronavirus Complications
description: Jacqueline Towns, mother of  Minnesota Timberwolves  star  Karl-Anthony Towns , died because of COVID-19-related complications, the family  announced  in a statement shared by the team Monday...
content:
David Sherman/Getty Images
Jacqueline Towns, mother of Minnesota Timberwolves star Karl-Anthony Towns, died because of COVID-19-related complications, the family announced in a statement shared by the team Monday. 
"Jackie, as she was affectionately known a… [+1078 chars]
